Ukraine security service probes possible secret surveillance of journalistsUkraine's domestic security service said on Wednesday it was investigating whether several employees of an investigative journalism outlet had been put under illegal surveillance, after a video online claimed to show them taking recreational drugs. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 16:49:20 GMT 5THY7MKYIBKBBGZGVBJOHOKCIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-security-service-probes-possible-secret-surveillance-journalists-2024-01-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Exclusive: Qatari court convicts ex-finance minister of laundering $5.6bn - documentA criminal court in Qatar has sentenced the Gulf Arab state's former finance minister to 20 years in prison for laundering more than $5.6 billion, according to a document outlining the judgment seen by Reuters. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 16:35:18 GMT 2VFNX22OENMBDK7FTWUJV4NHLI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/qatari-court-convicts-ex-finance-minister-laundering-56bn-document-2024-01-17/Andrew Mills世界中东
Russia allocates another $1.23 bln to company buying planes from Western lessorsRussia has allocated an additional 107.7 billion roubles ($1.23 billion) from its rainy day fund to a state company that has been purchasing aircraft from foreign lessors, the finance ministry said on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 16:19:35 GMT GY3DGFQRXBKY3KEZ2AYOM4MHMM https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/ Russia-allocates-another-123-bln-company-buying-planes-western-lessors-2024-01-17/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Bosnian Serb leader calls trial "political", proceedings adjourned againBosnian Serb leader Milorad Dodik took to the stand on Wednesday in a trial in which he is accused of defying the rulings of an international peace envoy, calling the proceedings a "political process" and attacking prosecutors. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 16:18:51 GMT ZECKWS7JZZMHRJR64ROLA5T4CQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/bosnian-serb-leader-calls-Trial-political-proceedings-adjourned-again-2024-01-17/Daria Sito-Sucic世界欧洲
The militant group in Pakistan targeted by Iranian strikesIran's foreign minister has said its missile and drone strikes in Pakistan on Tuesday evening targeted a militant group that it claimed was linked to Israel. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 16:11:55 GMT 3PVOWX3NCJN33K3MWWP33NQQNI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/militant-group-pakistan-targeted-by-iranian-strikes-2024-01-17/Reuters世界亚太地区
Scientists reveal how Greenland Ice Sheet has shrunk over past four decadesThe Greenland Ice Sheet lost 5,091 sq km (1930 sq miles) of area between 1985 and 2022, according to a study in the journal Nature published on Wednesday, the first full ice-sheet wide estimate of area loss on that scale. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 16:09:50 GMT LHWGFSZBO5JVVAOEPHV4BQXQII https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/scientists-reveal-how-greenland-ice-sheet-has-shrunk-over-past-four-decades-2024-01-17/Gloria Dickie商业环境
Ukraine's ally Poland looking into how to make more ammunition - foreign ministerPoland's new government is looking into how it can make more ammunition and military equipment as it works on a new aid package for Ukraine, Foreign Minister Radoslaw Sikorski said in Davos on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 15:38:57 GMT VSXEGMX5ZJI3HBQNU4BVU2MSJU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-ally-poland-looking-into-how-make-more-ammunition-foreign-minister-2024-01-17/Antoni Slodkowski商业达沃斯
Fighting intensifies in Ukraine's east as Russia steps up offensive actionUkrainian artillery forces fighting near the Russian-occupied city of Bakhmut say Russian troops are constantly making offensive assaults as fighting intensifies and Kyiv waits for more military aid from the West. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 15:37:35 GMT JPPBE2TWVJMFHOU3WT44Z2YC2U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/fighting-intensizes-ukraines-east-Russia-steps-up-offective-action-2024-01-17/Reuters世界欧洲
US relists Houthis as terrorists in response to Red Sea attacksThe Biden administration on Wednesday returned the Yemen-based Houthi rebels to a list of terrorist groups, U.S. officials said, in the latest attempt by Washington to stem attacks on international shipping. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 15:33:54 GMT 7QNHUKL4CNKVBA2VUST6T5MYKI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-relists-houthis-terrorists-response-red-sea-attacks-2024-01-17/Simon Lewis, Steve Holland世界美国
Aid for Israeli hostages and Palestinian civilians arrives at Gaza borderAid destined for Israeli hostages and Palestinian residents in the Gaza Strip was delivered to Egypt on Wednesday for transfer across the border, following a deal brokered by Qatar and France. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 15:16:09 GMT JGJN63ZI2BJEHCFEEFVD2LJE64 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/aid-israeli-hostages-palestinian-civilians-arrives-gaza-border-2024-01-17/Reuters世界中东
Taiwan reports first major post-election Chinese military activityTaiwan's defence ministry said it had detected on Wednesday evening 18 Chinese air force planes operating around Taiwan and carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" with Chinese warships, the first large-scale post-election military activity. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 14:33:15 GMT UP2DHH3PFBNY7KWILLOUK6KOJA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-reports-first-major-post-election-chinese-military-activity-2024-01-17/Reuters世界亚太地区
